mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL WHERE APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId} AND APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.DEL_FLG = '0'

SELECT
FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL LEFT JOIN COU_MST ON COU_MST.COUNTRY_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.COUNTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID1 , C.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID2 , D.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID3 , B.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM1 , C.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM2 , D.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST B ON A.INDUSTRY_ID1 = B.INDUSTRY_ID AND B.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST C ON A.INDUSTRY_ID2 = C.INDUSTRY_ID AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST D ON A.INDUSTRY_ID3 = D.INDUSTRY_ID AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' ) INDUSTRY_SELECT ON INDUSTRY_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_1 , C.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_2 , D.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_3 , E.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_1 , F.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_2 , G.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_3 , H.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_1 , I.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_2 , J.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_3 , B.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_1 , C.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_2 , D.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_3 , E.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_1 , F.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_2 , G.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_3 , H.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_1 , I.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_2 , J.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST B ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_1 = B.JOBTYPE_ID AND B.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST C ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_2 = C.JOBTYPE_ID AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST D ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_3 = D.JOBTYPE_ID AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST E ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_1 = E.JOBTYPE_ID AND E.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST F ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_2 = F.JOBTYPE_ID AND F.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST G ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_3 = G.JOBTYPE_ID AND G.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST H ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_1 = H.JOBTYPE_ID AND H.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST I ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_2 = I.JOBTYPE_ID AND I.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST J ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_3 = J.JOBTYPE_ID AND J.DEL_FLG = '0' ) JOBTYPE_SELECT ON JOBTYPE_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID1 , C.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID2 , D.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID3 , B.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM1 , C.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM2 , D.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST B ON A.HOPE_LAND1 = B.PREFE_ID AND B.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST C ON A.HOPE_LAND2 = C.PREFE_ID AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST D ON A.HOPE_LAND3 = D.PREFE_ID AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' ) PREFECTURES_SELECT ON PREFECTURES_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID WHERE APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.USER_CD = #{userCd} AND APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.DEL_FLG = '0' AND COU_MST.DEL_FLG = '0'

SELECT
FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL LEFT JOIN COU_MST ON APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.COUNTRY_ID = COU_MST.COUNTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID1 , C.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID2 , D.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID3 , B.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM1 , C.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM2 , D.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST B ON A.INDUSTRY_ID1 = B.INDUSTRY_ID LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST C ON A.INDUSTRY_ID2 = C.INDUSTRY_ID LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST D ON A.INDUSTRY_ID3 = D.INDUSTRY_ID WHERE B.DEL_FLG = '0' AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' ) INDUSTRY_SELECT ON APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID = INDUSTRY_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_1 , C.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_2 , D.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_3 , E.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_1 , F.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_2 , G.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_3 , H.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_1 , I.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_2 , J.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_3 , B.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_1 , C.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_2 , D.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_3 , E.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_1 , F.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_2 , G.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_3 , H.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_1 , I.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_2 , J.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST B ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_1 = B.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST C ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_2 = C.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST D ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_3 = D.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST E ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_1 = E.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST F ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_2 = F.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST G ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_3 = G.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST H ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_1 = H.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST I ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_2 = I.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST J ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_3 = J.JOBTYPE_ID WHERE B.DEL_FLG = '0' AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' AND E.DEL_FLG = '0' AND F.DEL_FLG = '0' AND G.DEL_FLG = '0' AND H.DEL_FLG = '0' AND I.DEL_FLG = '0' AND J.DEL_FLG = '0' ) JOBTYPE_SELECT ON JOBTYPE_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID1 , C.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID2 , D.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID3 , B.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM1 , C.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM2 , D.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST B ON A.HOPE_LAND1 = B.PREFE_ID LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST C ON A.HOPE_LAND2 = C.PREFE_ID LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST D ON A.HOPE_LAND3 = D.PREFE_ID WHERE B.DEL_FLG = '0' AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' ) PREFECTURES_SELECT ON PREFECTURES_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID WHERE APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId} AND APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.DEL_FLG = '0' AND COU_MST.DEL_FLG = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLICANT_INFO_TBL ( APPLICANT_ID, USER_CD, BIRTHDAY, APPLICANT_POSTAL, COUNTRY_ID, PREFE_NM, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, STATION, HOPE_LAND1, HOPE_LAND2, HOPE_LAND3, PHOTO, WORK_SITUATION, GRADUATION_SCHOOL, GRADUATION_MAJOR, WORK_YEARS, INDUSTRY_ID1, JOBTYPE_ID1_1, JOBTYPE_ID1_2, JOBTYPE_ID1_3, INDUSTRY_ID2, JOBTYPE_ID2_1, JOBTYPE_ID2_2, JOBTYPE_ID2_3, INDUSTRY_ID3, JOBTYPE_ID3_1, JOBTYPE_ID3_2, JOBTYPE_ID3_3, FINAL_EDUCATION, HOPE_SALARY_FROM, HOPE_SALARY_TO, INTRODUCE, REASON, SPECIALTY, INTEREST, REMAINDER, POINT, LEVEL_ID, REMARKS, DEL_FLG, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( default, #{c010101VueForm.userCd}, #{c010101VueForm.birthday}, #{c010101VueForm.applicantPostal}, #{c010101VueForm.countryId}, #{c010101VueForm.prefeNm}, #{c010101VueForm.address1}, #{c010101VueForm.address2}, #{c010101VueForm.station}, #{c010101VueForm.hopeLand1}, #{c010101VueForm.hopeLand2}, #{c010101VueForm.hopeLand3}, #{c010101VueForm.photo}, #{c010101VueForm.workSituation}, #{c010101VueForm.graduationSchool}, #{c010101VueForm.graduationMajor}, #{c010101VueForm.workYears}, #{c010101VueForm.industryId1}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId1_1}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId1_2}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId1_3}, #{c010101VueForm.industryId2}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId2_1}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId2_2}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId2_3}, #{c010101VueForm.industryId3}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId3_1}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId3_2}, #{c010101VueForm.jobtypeId3_3}, #{c010101VueForm.finalEducation}, #{c010101VueForm.hopeSalaryFrom}, #{c010101VueForm.hopeSalaryTo}, #{c010101VueForm.introduce}, #{c010101VueForm.reason}, #{c010101VueForm.specialty}, #{c010101VueForm.interest}, 0, 0, 0, #{c010101VueForm.remarks}, '0', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), #{c010101VueForm.userCd}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) )
mapper.select: SELECT APPLICANT_ID FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL WHERE APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.USER_CD = #{userCd}

SELECT APPLICANT_ID, USER_CD, INDUSTRY_ID1, JOBTYPE_ID1_1, JOBTYPE_ID1_2, JOBTYPE_ID1_3, INDUSTRY_ID2, JOBTYPE_ID2_1, JOBTYPE_ID2_2, JOBTYPE_ID2_3, INDUSTRY_ID3, JOBTYPE_ID3_1, JOBTYPE_ID3_2, JOBTYPE_ID3_3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL WHERE APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.USER_CD = #{userCd}
SELECT USER_TBL.FIRST_NAME, USER_TBL.LAST_NAME FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL,USER_TBL WHERE APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.USER_CD = USER_TBL.USER_CD AND APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId}

SELECT
FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL LEFT JOIN COU_MST ON COU_MST.COUNTRY_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.COUNTRY_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID1 , C.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID2 , D.INDUSTRY_ID INDUSTRY_ID3 , B.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM1 , C.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM2 , D.INDUSTRY_NM INDUSTRY_NM3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST B ON A.INDUSTRY_ID1 = B.INDUSTRY_ID LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST C ON A.INDUSTRY_ID2 = C.INDUSTRY_ID LEFT JOIN INDUSTRY_MST D ON A.INDUSTRY_ID3 = D.INDUSTRY_ID WHERE B.DEL_FLG = '0' AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' ) INDUSTRY_SELECT ON INDUSTRY_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_1 , C.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_2 , D.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID1_3 , E.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_1 , F.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_2 , G.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID2_3 , H.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_1 , I.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_2 , J.JOBTYPE_ID JOBTYPE_ID3_3 , B.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_1 , C.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_2 , D.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM1_3 , E.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_1 , F.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_2 , G.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM2_3 , H.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_1 , I.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_2 , J.JOBTYPE_NM JOBTYPE_NM3_3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST B ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_1 = B.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST C ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_2 = C.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST D ON A.JOBTYPE_ID1_3 = D.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST E ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_1 = E.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST F ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_2 = F.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST G ON A.JOBTYPE_ID2_3 = G.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST H ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_1 = H.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST I ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_2 = I.JOBTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN JOBTYPE_MST J ON A.JOBTYPE_ID3_3 = J.JOBTYPE_ID WHERE B.DEL_FLG = '0' AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' AND E.DEL_FLG = '0' AND F.DEL_FLG = '0' AND G.DEL_FLG = '0' AND H.DEL_FLG = '0' AND I.DEL_FLG = '0' AND J.DEL_FLG = '0' ) JOBTYPE_SELECT ON JOBTYPE_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.APPLICANT_ID , B.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID1 , C.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID2 , D.PREFE_ID as HOPE_LANDID3 , B.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM1 , C.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM2 , D.PREFE_NM as HOPE_LANDNM3 FROM APPLICANT_INFO_TBL A LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST B ON A.HOPE_LAND1 = B.PREFE_ID LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST C ON A.HOPE_LAND2 = C.PREFE_ID LEFT JOIN PREFECTURES_MST D ON A.HOPE_LAND3 = D.PREFE_ID WHERE B.DEL_FLG = '0' AND C.DEL_FLG = '0' AND D.DEL_FLG = '0' ) PREFECTURES_SELECT ON PREFECTURES_SELECT.APPLICANT_ID = APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID WHERE APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId} AND APPLICANT_INFO_TBL.DEL_FLG = '0' AND COU_MST.DEL_FLG = '0'
